definition: The term refers to young individuals who attend a specific educational institution. It commonly denotes children of a certain age group who participate in activities and receive early education in a specific setting.

examples.english: The kindergarten children play in the garden.
The kindergarten children paint colorful pictures.
The kindergarten children sing cheerful songs.
The kindergarten children learn the alphabet.

examples.german: Die Kindergartenkinder machen einen Ausflug zum Zoo.
examples.english: The kindergarten children go on a trip to the zoo.
